transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
[unintelligible]
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain, usne aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
Hello.
Hanji Amit ji, Vivek bol raha hun IndiaMART head office se.
Boliye sir.
Kal ja mam se baat hui hogi, main assign kiya gaya hu aapko as a account manager. Theek hai.
To main hi aapki profile ko dekhunga, main hi profile pe work karunga. Aur bataiye kaise hain sir aap?
Thik hai sir.
Thik hai, kaisa chal raha hai business vagera?
Kuch nahi chal raha sir business vagera to jab order nahi aa rahe to business kahan se chalega. Order nahi aa rahe.
Thik hai, befikar rahiye main profile pe work karunga. Koi bhi concern query rahega main aapko apna personal number provide kar raha hun. Thik hai.
Aur hum been touch rahenge aur koi concern query rahega to main aap logo ko hun befikar hoke aap kabhi bhi call kar sakte hain. Monday to Friday to available rehta hun main. Otherwise Saturday Sunday bhi agar kabhi call karenge to mere ko whatsapp drop kar dena.
Koi nahi sir, koi nahi, wo to main bhi Saturday Sunday to vaise bhi nahi karta hun main kisi ko call.
Koi issue nahi, koi issue nahi sir. Maine aapko na ek madam ki mail se na aapke pass ek video meeting ka link aaya hua hai. Aap ek bar join kar lijiye use. Main ek bar aapke profile ko go through kar leta hun. Koi concern.
Aap phone pe hi kar lo na sir meeting aise hi.
Video pe aap dekh bhi payenge na use sir. Aapke pass available nahi hai kya aapke pass?
5 minute de do phir mere ko, main 5 minute mein aapko call kar deta hun mere ko.
Thik hai, mere ko call back kar lijiye. Main apne number se aapko whatsapp pe hi bhi text kar raha hun. Thik hai?
Thik hai.
Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Business is not running well due to no orders.

Resolution:

- Executive assured to work on customer's profile.

- Executive provided his personal number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 5 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, profile, video meeting
